text:
="preserve">Francis Dufour (March 28, 1929 – May 25, 2020) was a Canadian politician. He was the member for Jonquière in the National Assembly of Quebec from 1985 to 1996. He was a member of the Parti Québécois from 1985 until 1996. Dufour was born in Jonquière, Quebec.
Dufour died on May 25, 2020 in Jonquière at the age of 91.
